Night's watchman.description: Push a commit authored between 1AM and 4AM

Tree of life.description: Push to five or more branches within the same day

Not your day.description: Fail five pipelines in a row the same day

Refactoring.description: Remove more lines of code than what is added

Up with the Birds.description: A cup of your favorite brew, some musing playing in the background. Push a commit authored between 5AM and 7AM

Skipping lunch.description: Push a commit authored between 11AM and 12AM

Apprentice Reviewer.description: Write more than 25 comments on merge reviews not authored by yourself

Adept Reviewer.description: Write more than 75 comments on merge reviews not authored by yourself

Master Reviewer.description: Write more than 150 comments on merge reviews not authored by yourself

Grandmaster Reviewer.description: Write more than 200 comments on merge reviews not authored by yourself

Prospector of the Pipeline.description: Pass 5 or more pipelines in a row

Protector of the Pipeline.description: Pass 7 or more pipelines in a row

Knight of the Pipeline.description: Pass 15 or more pipelines in a row

Guardian of the Pipeline.description: Pass 20 or more pipelines in a row
